name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create App Store Connect API Key - Guides

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tiny tool to create api key for App Store Connect

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: App Store Connect requires you to create API Key by signing a JWT API Token with mixed credentials and identities. This tool will guide you through the process of creating one.
